channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kate Winslet Says First 'Intimate' Experiences as a Teen Were with Women: 'I’d Kissed a Few Girls, and I’d Kissed a Few Boys'
item.description: The actress explained, however, that she "wasn’t particularly evolved in either direction"

item.title: John Legend Celebrates His 47th Birthday by Getting Slimed with Wife Chrissy Teigen and Their 4 Kids

item.title: Melanie Watson Once Said She Struggled with Using Wheelchair on “Diff’rent Strokes ”Set: 'I Was Carried Everywhere'
item.description: Watson, who died on Dec. 26 at age 57, was born with Osteogenesis Imperfecta and used a wheelchair
